Key Arguments: The right to express thoughts and opinions should be protected without fear of being silenced.
Individuals should be able to independently evaluate information and make informed decisions.
The potential consequences of the Disinformation Bill on democracy should be carefully evaluated.
A comprehensive, evidence-based approach is needed to address misinformation and disinformation while preserving civil liberties.
Notable Quotes: Every person should have the right to express their thoughts and opinions, without the threat of being bullied into silence.

I kindly request that you consider my concerns and use your influence to advocate for a comprehensive evidence-based approach to addressing the challenges of misinformation and disinformation, one that protects democracy while ensuring the preservation of our civil liberties.
